snippet: Real estate sales prices were stable in the first quarter, but brokers said a large number of recent contracts involved multiple offers above the asking price, indicating increased buyer confidence.
abstract: New York City real estate sales prices were stable in the first quarter of 2012, but brokers say a large number of recent contracts involved multiple offers above the asking price, indicating increased buyer confidence.
lead_paragraph: Real estate sales prices were stable in the first quarter, but brokers said a large number of recent contracts involved multiple offers above the asking price, indicating increased buyer confidence.

headline.seo: With Manhattan Real Estate Prices Flat, Bidding Wars Emerge
headline.main: Bidding Wars Amid Flat Property Prices in Manhattan
headline.print_headline: In Manhattan, Bid Wars Amid Flat Property Prices
